review: I ABSOLUTLEY LOVE IT!!!  I like to think I utilize my Amazon Prime membership to its max, and the Fire TV Stick is everything I had hoped it would be!!  I can watch all the shows I love and movies I've purchased right on my tv, no longer left to watch them on a much smaller computer screen.  I highly reccomend this product and would encourage all Amazon Prime members who enjoy the instant video streaming to get this product!
